Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of the server
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: Unique identifier for the process in the ServiceMapProcess_CL table.
Columns.Name: ProcessName

Columns.Description: Port IP address. Can be wildcard IP 0.0.0.0.
Columns.Name: Ip

Columns.Description: Port number.
Columns.Name: Port

Columns.Description: The protocol. Example tcp or udp (only tcp is currently supported).
Columns.Name: Protocol

Columns.Description: Specifies whether connection made as a wildcard bind request.
Columns.Name: IsWildcardBind

Columns.Description: Bytes sent on the port
Columns.Name: BytesSent

Columns.Description: Bytes received on the port
Columns.Name: BytesReceived

Columns.Description: Count of live links at the end of the time period recorded.
Columns.Name: LinksLive

Columns.Description: Count of terminated links over the time periof recorded.
Columns.Name: LinksTerminated

Columns.Description: Count of links established on the port.
Columns.Name: LinksEstablished

Columns.Description: Count of responses in the time period recorded.
Columns.Name: Responses

Columns.Description: Measurement of the total time between first and last byte received
Columns.Name: ResponseTimeSum

Columns.Description: Measurement of the minimum time between first and last byte received.
Columns.Name: ResponseTimeMin

Columns.Description: Measurement of the maximum time between first and last byte received.
Columns.Name: ResponseTimeMax

Columns.Description: Port ID.
Columns.Name: PortId

Columns.Description: Unique identifier to the machine in the ServiceMapComputer_CL table.
Columns.Name: Machine

Columns.Description: Identity of the process or group of processes that the port is associated with.
Columns.Name: Process

Columns.Description: Unique agent GUID for the agent reporting data on the server.
Columns.Name: AgentId

Columns.Description: Value is OpsManager for all records.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
